45.eng-name: Chapters on The Virtues of the Qur'an
45.ara-name: كتاب ثواب القرآن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Abbas:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Idha Zulzilat is equal to half of the Qur'an, Qul Huwa Allahu Ahad is equal to a third of the Qur'an, and Yul Ya Ayyuhal-Kafirun is equal to a fourth of the Qur'an

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِذَا زُلْزِلَتْ
chapter.eng-name: 'What Has Been Related About Idha Zulzilat'
